#summary Instructions for anonymously checking out project source

====Classic====
 Use this command to anonymously check out the latest OpenTyrian Classic source code:
{{{
# Non-members may check out a read-only working copy anonymously over HTTP.
svn checkout http://opentyrian.googlecode.com/svn/classic/trunk/ opentyrian-read-only 
}}}

====Enhanced====
 Use this command to anonymously check out the latest OpenTyrian Enhanced source code:
{{{
# Non-members may check out a read-only working copy anonymously over HTTP.
svn checkout http://opentyrian.googlecode.com/svn/enhanced/trunk/ opentyrian-read-only 
}}}
